meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed him with orchitis after the swelling and pain in his testicles.
meanings.sent2: Orchitis can be quite painful and uncomfortable for men.
meanings.sent3: When the man's testicles threw a party and got all inflamed, the doctor said it was orchitis.
meanings.sent4: His testicles felt like they were on fire, a raging orchitis storm within his body.
meanings.sent5: The orchitis made his testicles look like two angry red balloons.

meanings.definition: Swelling and pain in the testicles.
meanings.sent1: The orchitis caused him a lot of discomfort with the swelling and pain in his testicles.
meanings.sent2: He winced in pain as the orchitis made his testicles swell up.
meanings.sent3: The orchitis in his testicles made him walk like a penguin, much to his friends' amusement.
meanings.sent4: The orchitis felt like a heavy weight pulling down on his testicles, a burden he had to bear.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing orchitis in his testicles was a constant reminder of his discomfort.
